Frederick Earl "Shorty" Long (May 20, 1940 — June 29, 1969) bụ ónyé America na-agụ egwu, ónyé na-ede egwu, ónyé egwu, na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ maka Motown's Soul Records
A nabatara ya na Alabama Jazz Hall of Fame na 1980.

A mụrụ ya na Birmingham, Alabama, Long bịara Motown na 1963 site na akara Tri-Phi / Harvey, nke nwanne nwanyị Berry Gordy, Gwen, na di ya, Harvey Fuqua. Ihe mbụ ọ wepụtara, "Devil with the Blue Dress On" (1964), nkè ya na William "Mickey" Stevenson dere, bụ ihe ndekọ mbụ e wepụtara na Motown's Soul label, nke e mere màkà ndị na-ese ihe na-adabere na blues dịka Long. Ọ bụ ezie na abụ a edeghị na mba, Mitch Ryder na Detroit Wheels kpuchiri abụ ahụ ma mee ka ọ bụrụ ihe na 1966. Otu egwu Long nke 1966 "Function at the Junction" bụ nke mbụ ya na-ewu ewu, na-eru No
Ndị ọzọ a tọhapụrụ gụnyere "It's a Crying Shame" (1964), "Chantilly Lace" (1967), na "Night Fo' Last" (1968).
